author: arichardson
title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic joined Manchester United for nothing, but is he better free transfer than Andrea Pirlo, Paul Pogba and rest?
text:
EFL free-k results Zlatan Ibrahimovic joined Manchester United for nothing, but is he better free transfer than Andrea Pirlo, Paul Pogba and rest? 
Swede arrived for zero in summer and has now hit 20 goals â€” so does this make him best football freebie in game's history? By ANDREW RICHARDSON
